content:
I'm finally getting around to listening to the Agile Podcast. https://theagilepodcast.com/

Am I missing anything or do I have to listen to this through Youtube or website? Isn't there anyway for me to listen with my Podcast program?
So, I just need to figure out how to add that feed to my podcast app.

OK, I used PocketCasts for podcasts. After signing up for the service and looking again, I was able to find The Agile Podcast in their list of available Podcasts. I didn't see it my first time through
Didn't realize at first that this is a fairly new Podcast, less than 10 episodes. But, I think that they are really targeting Drupal 7 site owners.
This is done by Blake, who many of you met at Backdrop LIVE
he was also at the badcamp training
